attributes.action: Remove and Prevent any restrictions on those who refuse a Covid-19 vaccination
attributes.additional_details: We’ve never placed restrictions for not having a flu jab, they promised we live in a free country and it will remain that way, so why have things changed
attributes.background: I want the Government to prevent any restrictions being placed on those who refuse to have any potential Covid-19 vaccine. This includes restrictions on travel, social events, such as concerts or sports. No restrictions whatsoever.
